tweets.text: UPDATE: The Environment Agency have isolated the source of the issue and are working with Northumbrian Water to cleanse the effected pipes. For the time being they are still advising that people do not enter the water until this work has been completed.

An excellent letter from @NewsNBC, calling again for an independent investigation into the long-term failures in the regulation of Walley's Quarry by the @EnvAgency.

I will be quoting from this letter in my @HouseofCommons debate tomorrow evening (expected shortly after 7pm). https://t.co/FYNgbvmckV
